DirectoryClassLoader - class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.DirectoryClassLoader.
A DirectoryClassLoader is a utility class that provides the ablility to dynamically load a class from a directory in the file system.
DirectoryClassLoader(String) - Constructor for class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.DirectoryClassLoader
Allocate a new DirectoryClassLoader that can load classes from the directory identified by the string parameter.
distLevel - Variable in class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.KSFrame
 
doWork() - Method in interface edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.Controller
When an object implementing the interface Controller is used to create a thread, the starting thread causes the objects doWork method to be called.
DrawableRobot - class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.DrawableRobot.
A DrawableRobot class provides methods to calculate a new position of the robot based on the current state of the robot
DrawableRobot(CurrentRobotState) - Constructor for class edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.DrawableRobot
Allocate a new DrawableRobot object with the current robot state.
